## Properties

| Property       | Attribute       | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | Type     | Default     |
| -------------- | --------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `accessToken`  | `access-token`  | To use Mapbox GL JS, you need to have a Mapbox access token. https://docs.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/guides/install/#:~:text=have%20a%20Mapbox-,access%20token,-.%20This%20access%20token                                        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `height`       | `height`        | Represents the height of a map. Supported all CSS values. Default value: '100%'                                                                                                                                               | `string` | `'100%'`    |
| `lat`          | `lat`           | Represents the latitude coordinate of a geographical location.                                                                                                                                                                | `number` | `51.759445` |
| `lng`          | `lng`           | Represents the longitude coordinate of a geographical location.                                                                                                                                                               | `number` | `19.457216` |
| `mapStyle`     | `map-style`     | Url to your Map Box style https://docs.mapbox.com/help/dive-deeper/map-design/                                                                                                                                                | `string` | `undefined` |
| `markerHeight` | `marker-height` | Set height in pixels for marker                                                                                                                                                                                               | `string` | `'50px'`    |
| `markerUrl`    | `marker-url`    | Represents the URL of the marker icon to be used in a map. If no url there will be used default icon.  Sometimes the default icon can be restricted like in VitVe https://vite.dev/config/server-options.html#server-fs-allow | `string` | `undefined` |
| `markerWidth`  | `marker-width`  | Set width in pixels for marker                                                                                                                                                                                                | `string` | `'50px'`    |
| `width`        | `width`         | Represents the width of a map. Supported all CSS values. Default value: '100%'                                                                                                                                                | `string` | `'100%'`    |
| `zoom`         | `zoom`          | Initial zoom level min 0, max 15                                                                                                                                                                                              | `number` | `11`        |
